Malice:
 
The Hunter rolls onto his chest, and using his arms crossed in front of him as a pillow, he gets ready to go to sleep, watching over Blacknightmare.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"I'd try "said the femme and she closed her eyes tryig to sleep

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The male slid over close to Blacknightmare and rolled over on his 
side so he was close and facing her.
> "Try to get some sleep.  You'll feel better if you do.  Stop 
thinking about whatever it is, and get some sleep."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "Yes I'm"said soflty the femme
.
